018package com.scivicslab.actoriac;
019
020import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.DistributedLogStore;
021import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
022import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.CallableByActionName;
023import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.ActorSystemAware;
024import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
025import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
026
027import org.json.JSONObject;
028
029import java.sql.*;
030import java.util.*;
031import java.util.logging.Level;
032import java.util.logging.Logger;
033
034/**
035 * Workflow execution reporter for actor-IaC.
036 *
037 * <p>Aggregates workflow execution results and generates final reports.
038 * Messages starting with '%' prefix are collected and displayed in the
039 * final report, enabling simple check/status reporting from workflows.</p>
040 *
041 * <h2>Usage in workflows:</h2>
042 * <pre>
043 * - actor: this
044 *   method: executeCommand
045 *   arguments:
046 *     - |
047 *       if command -v node > /dev/null; then
048 *         echo "%[OK] Node.js: $(node --version)"
049 *       else
050 *         echo "%[ERROR] Node.js: not found"
051 *       fi
052 * </pre>
053 *
054 * <h2>Actions:</h2>
055 * <ul>
056 *   <li>{@code report} - Generate workflow execution report. Args: sessionId (optional)</li>
057 *   <li>{@code transition-summary} - Show transition success/failure summary. Args: sessionId</li>
058 * </ul>
059 *
060 * <h2>Report Output Example:</h2>
061 * <pre>
062 * === Workflow Execution Report ===
063 * Session #42 | Workflow: DocumentDeployWorkflow | Status: COMPLETED
064 *
065 * --- Check Results ---
066 * [OK] Node.js: v18.0.0
067 * [OK] yarn: 1.22.19
068 * [ERROR] Maven: not found
069 *
070 * --- Transitions ---
071 * [✓] check-doclist
072 * [✓] detect-changes
073 * [✗] build-docs: yarn not found
074 *
075 * === Result: FAILED ===
076 * </pre>
077 *
078 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
079 * @since 2.12.2
080 */
081public class WorkflowReporter implements CallableByActionName, ActorSystemAware {
082
083    private static final String CLASS_NAME = WorkflowReporter.class.getName();
084    private static final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(CLASS_NAME);
085
086    /** Prefix for messages to be included in the final report. */
087    private static final String REPORT_PREFIX = "%";
088
089    private Connection connection;
090    private IIActorSystem system;
091
092    /** Pre-collected lines to be added at the beginning of the report. */
093    private final List<String> preLines = new ArrayList<>();
094
095    /**
096     * Sets the database connection for log queries.
097     *
098     * @param connection the JDBC connection to the H2 log database
099     */
100    public void setConnection(Connection connection) {
101        this.connection = connection;
102    }
103
104    @Override
105    public void setActorSystem(IIActorSystem system) {
106        logger.entering(CLASS_NAME, "setActorSystem", system);
107        this.system = system;
108        logger.exiting(CLASS_NAME, "setActorSystem");
109    }
110
111    @Override
112    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String args) {
113        logger.info("WorkflowReporter.callByActionName: actionName=" + actionName + ", args=" + args);
114        try {
115            ActionResult result = switch (actionName) {
116                case "report" -> generateReport(args);
117                case "transition-summary" -> transitionSummary(args);
118                case "addLine" -> addLine(args);
119                default -> {
120                    logger.warning("WorkflowReporter: Unknown action: " + actionName);
121                    yield new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
122                }
123            };
124            logger.info("WorkflowReporter.callByActionName: result=" + result.isSuccess());
125            return result;
126        } catch (Exception e) {
127            ActionResult errorResult = new ActionResult(false, "Error: " + e.getMessage());
128            logger.logp(Level.WARNING, CLASS_NAME, "callByActionName", "Exception occurred", e);
129            return errorResult;
130        }
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * Add a line to the report.
135     *
136     * <p>Lines added via this method will appear at the beginning of the
137     * "Check Results" section in the report. This is useful for adding
138     * workflow description or other contextual information.</p>
139     *
140     * <p>The argument is passed as a JSON array from the workflow engine,
141     * so this method extracts the first element.</p>
142     *
143     * @param args the JSON array containing the line to add
144     * @return ActionResult indicating success
145     */
146    private ActionResult addLine(String args) {
147        logger.info("WorkflowReporter.addLine called with args: " + args);
148        try {
149            // Parse the JSON array to extract the actual line
150            org.json.JSONArray jsonArray = new org.json.JSONArray(args);
151            if (jsonArray.length() > 0) {
152                String line = jsonArray.getString(0);
153                preLines.add(line);
154                logger.info("WorkflowReporter.addLine: added line: " + line);
155            }
156            return new ActionResult(true, "Line added");
157        } catch (Exception e) {
158            logger.warning("WorkflowReporter.addLine: exception: " + e.getMessage());
159            // Fallback: treat args as plain string
160            if (args != null && !args.isEmpty() && !args.equals("[]")) {
161                preLines.add(args);
162            }
163            return new ActionResult(true, "Line added (fallback)");
164        }
165    }
166
167    /**
168     * Generate workflow execution report.
169     *
170     * <p>Collects messages starting with '%' prefix and generates a summary report.</p>
171     *
172     * @param sessionIdStr session ID to report on, or empty for auto-retrieval
173     */
174    private ActionResult generateReport(String sessionIdStr) {
175        logger.entering(CLASS_NAME, "generateReport", sessionIdStr);
176        if (connection == null) {
177            return new ActionResult(false, "Not connected. Database connection not set.");
178        }
179
180        try {
181            long sessionId = resolveSessionId(sessionIdStr);
182
183            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
184            sb.append("=== Workflow Execution Report ===\n");
185
186            // Get session info
187            String sessionInfo = getSessionInfo(sessionId);
188            if (sessionInfo != null) {
189                sb.append(sessionInfo).append("\n");
190            }
191
192            // Add pre-collected lines first
193            if (!preLines.isEmpty()) {
194                sb.append("\n");
195                for (String line : preLines) {
196                    sb.append(line).append("\n");
197                }
198            }
199
200            // Get messages with % prefix
201            List<String> reportMessages = getReportMessages(sessionId);
202            if (!reportMessages.isEmpty()) {
203                sb.append("\n--- Check Results ---\n");
204                for (String msg : reportMessages) {
205                    sb.append(msg).append("\n");
206                }
207            }
208
209            // Get transition summary
210            String transitionInfo = buildTransitionSummary(sessionId);
211            if (transitionInfo != null) {
212                sb.append("\n--- Transitions ---\n");
213                sb.append(transitionInfo);
214            }
215
216            // Get final status
217            String finalStatus = getFinalStatus(sessionId);
218            sb.append("\n").append(finalStatus);
219
220            String result = sb.toString();
221            reportToMultiplexer(result);
222            return new ActionResult(true, result);
223
224        } catch (Exception e) {
225            return new ActionResult(false, "Report generation failed: " + e.getMessage());
226        }
227    }
228
229    /**
230     * Get session information.
231     */
232    private String getSessionInfo(long sessionId) throws SQLException {
233        String sql = "SELECT workflow_name, overlay_name, status, started_at, ended_at " +
234                     "FROM sessions WHERE id = ?";
235        try (PreparedStatement ps = connection.prepareStatement(sql)) {
236            ps.setLong(1, sessionId);
237            try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
238                if (rs.next()) {
239                    String workflow = rs.getString("workflow_name");
240                    String overlay = rs.getString("overlay_name");
241                    String status = rs.getString("status");
242                    Timestamp started = rs.getTimestamp("started_at");
243                    Timestamp ended = rs.getTimestamp("ended_at");
244
245                    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
246                    sb.append("Session #").append(sessionId);
247                    if (workflow != null) sb.append(" | Workflow: ").append(workflow);
248                    if (overlay != null) sb.append(" | Overlay: ").append(overlay);
249                    sb.append(" | Status: ").append(status);
250                    if (started != null) sb.append("\nStarted: ").append(started);
251                    if (ended != null) sb.append(" | Ended: ").append(ended);
252                    return sb.toString();
253                }
254            }
255        }
256        return null;
257    }
258
259    /**
260     * Get messages with % prefix from logs.
261     */
262    private List<String> getReportMessages(long sessionId) throws SQLException {
263        List<String> messages = new ArrayList<>();
264
265        String sql = "SELECT message FROM logs WHERE session_id = ? ORDER BY timestamp";
266        try (PreparedStatement ps = connection.prepareStatement(sql)) {
267            ps.setLong(1, sessionId);
268            try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
269                while (rs.next()) {
270                    String message = rs.getString("message");
271                    if (message != null) {
272                        // Extract lines starting with %
273                        for (String line : message.split("\n")) {
274                            String trimmed = line.trim();
275                            // Handle prefixes like [node-xxx] %message
276                            String cleaned = trimmed.replaceFirst("^\\[node-[^\\]]+\\]\\s*", "");
277                            if (cleaned.startsWith(REPORT_PREFIX)) {
278                                messages.add(cleaned.substring(1).trim());
279                            }
280                        }
281                    }
282                }
283            }
284        }
285        return messages;
286    }
287
288    /**
289     * Build transition summary.
290     */
291    private String buildTransitionSummary(long sessionId) throws SQLException {
292        String sql = "SELECT label, level, message FROM logs " +
293                     "WHERE session_id = ? AND message LIKE 'Transition %' " +
294                     "ORDER BY timestamp";
295
296        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
297        int success = 0;
298        int failed = 0;
299
300        try (PreparedStatement ps = connection.prepareStatement(sql)) {
301            ps.setLong(1, sessionId);
302            try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
303                while (rs.next()) {
304                    String label = rs.getString("label");
305                    String level = rs.getString("level");
306                    String message = rs.getString("message");
307
308                    boolean isSuccess = message.contains("SUCCESS");
309                    if (isSuccess) {
310                        success++;
311                        sb.append("[✓] ").append(label != null ? label : "unknown").append("\n");
312                    } else {
313                        failed++;
314                        sb.append("[✗] ").append(label != null ? label : "unknown");
315                        // Extract failure reason
316                        int dashIdx = message.indexOf(" - ");
317                        if (dashIdx > 0) {
318                            sb.append(": ").append(message.substring(dashIdx + 3));
319                        }
320                        sb.append("\n");
321                    }
322                }
323            }
324        }
325
326        if (success == 0 && failed == 0) {
327            return null;
328        }
329
330        sb.append("\nSummary: ").append(success).append(" succeeded, ").append(failed).append(" failed");
331        return sb.toString();
332    }
333
334    /**
335     * Get final session status.
336     */
337    private String getFinalStatus(long sessionId) throws SQLException {
338        String sql = "SELECT status FROM sessions WHERE id = ?";
339        try (PreparedStatement ps = connection.prepareStatement(sql)) {
340            ps.setLong(1, sessionId);
341            try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
342                if (rs.next()) {
343                    String status = rs.getString("status");
344                    if ("COMPLETED".equals(status)) {
345                        return "=== Result: SUCCESS ===";
346                    } else if ("FAILED".equals(status)) {
347                        return "=== Result: FAILED ===";
348                    } else {
349                        return "=== Result: " + status + " ===";
350                    }
351                }
352            }
353        }
354        return "=== Result: UNKNOWN ===";
355    }
356
357    /**
358     * Show transition success/failure summary.
359     */
360    private ActionResult transitionSummary(String sessionIdStr) {
361        logger.entering(CLASS_NAME, "transitionSummary", sessionIdStr);
362        if (connection == null) {
363            return new ActionResult(false, "Not connected. Database connection not set.");
364        }
365
366        try {
367            long sessionId = resolveSessionId(sessionIdStr);
368            String summary = buildTransitionSummary(sessionId);
369            if (summary == null) {
370                summary = "No transition data found for session " + sessionId;
371            }
372            reportToMultiplexer(summary);
373            return new ActionResult(true, summary);
374        } catch (Exception e) {
375            return new ActionResult(false, "Query failed: " + e.getMessage());
376        }
377    }
378
379    /**
380     * Resolve session ID from argument or auto-retrieve from nodeGroup.
381     */
382    private long resolveSessionId(String sessionIdStr) throws NumberFormatException {
383        if (sessionIdStr == null || sessionIdStr.trim().isEmpty() || sessionIdStr.equals("[]")) {
384            String autoSessionId = getSessionIdFromNodeGroup();
385            if (autoSessionId == null) {
386                throw new NumberFormatException("Session ID not specified and could not retrieve from nodeGroup");
387            }
388            return Long.parseLong(autoSessionId);
389        }
390        return Long.parseLong(sessionIdStr.trim());
391    }
392
393    /**
394     * Retrieves session ID from nodeGroup actor.
395     */
396    private String getSessionIdFromNodeGroup() {
397        if (system == null) {
398            return null;
399        }
400        IIActorRef<?> nodeGroup = system.getIIActor("nodeGroup");
401        if (nodeGroup == null) {
402            return null;
403        }
404        ActionResult result = nodeGroup.callByActionName("getSessionId", "");
405        return result.isSuccess() ? result.getResult() : null;
406    }
407
408    /**
409     * Report result to outputMultiplexer.
410     */
411    private void reportToMultiplexer(String data) {
412        if (system == null) {
413            return;
414        }
415
416        IIActorRef<?> multiplexer = system.getIIActor("outputMultiplexer");
417        if (multiplexer == null) {
418            return;
419        }
420
421        JSONObject arg = new JSONObject();
422        arg.put("source", "workflow-reporter");
423        arg.put("type", "plugin-result");
424        arg.put("data", data);
425        multiplexer.callByActionName("add", arg.toString());
426    }
427}
